summary: This document is an order acknowledgment email from ADI to Fred Pridemore at Signet Technologies, Inc., for surveillance equipment totaling $102,598.83. The order was placed on August 20, 2019, and includes items such as PTZ cameras and network video recorders, shipped to an address in New York.

persons.name: Fred Pridemore
persons.context: Appears as the recipient of an order acknowledgment email for surveillance equipment from ADI to Signet Technologies, Inc.

events.title: Surveillance Equipment Order
events.description: An order for surveillance equipment (cameras, mounts, network video recorders) totaling $102,598.83 was placed by Signet Technologies, Inc., and acknowledged by ADI.

locations: 12300 Kiln Court Suite E, Beltsville, MD 20705
keyFacts: A large order of surveillance equipment (cameras, network video recorders, mounts) worth $102,598.83 was placed on August 20, 2019.
The order was placed by Signet Technologies, Inc., with Fred Pridemore as the contact, and shipped to an address in New York City (150 Park Row).
The equipment included 17 Q6055E/PTZ/1080P/X32/IP66 cameras and 75 Q8414LVS corner cameras, indicating a significant surveillance installation.
